Title: Relates to requiring advertisements to disclose the use of a synthetic performer
Summary: Requires advertisements to disclose the use of a synthetic performer; imposes a $1,000 civil penalty for a first violation and a $5,000 penalty for any subsequent violation.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring advertisements to disclose the use of a synthetic performer
